1.title: Brett Ratner, Dov Charney

episode of.title: My Friends Call Me Johnny (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Just before the Oscars, Johnny checks in with director Brett Ratner in Los Angeles, then flies to Budapest to film a small part in Ratner's newest film, "Hercules." Later, he gets a few tips in the art of seduction from French writers Virginie Mouzat and Capucine Motte, and then heads back to LA for a revealing one-on-one with recently ousted American Apparel founder Dov Charney.

2.title: Michael Douglas, Mario Batali

episode of.title: My Friends Call Me Johnny (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Monte Carlo with Michael Douglas, LA with photographer Tierney Gearon, Cannes with producer Jeremy Thomas, and New York with Mario Batali.

3.title: Roy Choi, Rick Rubin

episode of.title: My Friends Call Me Johnny (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Johnny gets Martha Stewart to open up about prison, talks rock n' roll with super-producer Rick Rubin, and shares a Korean taco with Kogi founder Roy Choi.

4.title: Lorne Michaels, Jean-Pierre Jeunet

episode of.title: My Friends Call Me Johnny (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: At 30 Rock with SNL producer Lorne Michaels, Art Basel with dealer Jeffrey Deitch and writer Derek Blasberg, and Paris with imaginative director Jean-Pierre Jeunet.

5.title: Jann Wenner, Giambattista Valli

episode of.title: My Friends Call Me Johnny (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Johnny catches up with Rolling Stone founder Jann Wenner, learns all about modeling from photographer Melanie Pullen, and chases the creative muse with designers David Kelley and Giambattista Valli.

6.title: Ebbe Altberg, Melanie Pullen

episode of.title: My Friends Call Me Johnny (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: A competition with billionaire businessman Chris Burch in New York, a lesson in virtual living with Linden Lab CEO Ebbe Altberg, and candid conversations with photographer Melanie Pullen and writer Jerry Stahl.

7.title: Stephen Chao, Calvin Klein

episode of.title: My Friends Call Me Johnny (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Renegade TV exec Stephen Chao on potato guns, fashion icon Calvin Klein on New York's glory days, and retired supermodel Ines de la Fressange on how she still pines for Johnny. Really.

8.title: James Toback, Andre Balazs

episode of.title: My Friends Call Me Johnny (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Johnny chats with movie director James Toback, hotelier Andre Balazs, real estate developer Richard LeFrak and PR maven Peggy Siegal.

imdb.plot outline: Heir to a European auto fortune, photographer, art collector, successful tech investor, jetsetter and creator of the men's clothing brand LimoLand - it's Jean "Johnny" Pigozzi's world...you just don't know it yet. Esquire Network's "My Friends Call Me Johnny" provides a twist on the typical talk show, with Pigozzi traveling the globe to ask the most provocative questions of his famous friends - as only he can.
imdb.title: My Friends Call Me Johnny
akas: My Friends Call Me Johnny (United States)
